Text:
Thanks for sharing this and sorry for late response. I was out of home and just saw your reply on Django unchained.

About the skull, it's not only about how many movies you did but also includes the no. of good comments, no. of seeders/leechers and also how the uploader interact and help others. At this rate you will get one soon ;)

Yeah yify's audio is terrible and your's is far good. Continue doing unique rare movies like now. Stay healthy. Cheers !!

I prefer rare old classics. If it's alright with you i would request few.

Absolutely. Request away. Anchorman 720p and Mallrats were both requests from people. I try and do at least 2-3 requests a month. I can't guarantee I can get my hands on high res source, but IF I can, I'd be happy to do it for you. What were you looking for?

Wow, 1.7GB and uploading at an average of 1.6mbps. You may be my new go-to torrent guy, Jalucian. 

I'll come back and rate the upload when it's done. Thanks again.
Every thing you upload has amazing quality and good size. YIFY < Jalucian

Hi. I am new to all this and not very tech savvy. I wanted to download this for transfer onto my USB so I can plug straight into my TV (60") and play it. I have done this successfully before and assumed it would work again but when I plugged USB into TV and tried to play, it wouldn't open. Said "cannot access file" or something like that.

Do I have to download a higher bit rate version in order for it to play on TV? 

Perhaps I need a specific type of file that is compatible with my TV? It is a sony Bravia Full HD LED LCD.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks
TW
